synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Greenish-blue crystals of MOFF-4 were isolated.
Green cubic crystals of MOFF-5 were isolated.

General_Information.activation_method_MOFF-4: Despite extensive attempts to optimize activation methods, MOFF-4 lost its crystallinity and porosity under all conditions.
General_Information.activation_method_MOFF-5: MOFF-5 maintained its crystallinity after activation by supercritical carbon dioxide (SCD) drying.
General_Information.thermal_stability: The decomposition temperatures for MOFF-4 and MOFF-5 are lower than those for similar non-fluorinated networks, possibly due to the weaker metal–ligand coordination.
